name: Hyperfight
description:
HYPERFIGHT is a fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts. You'll have to risk your points to gain access to your character's special and super moves, which can turn the tide of the game in a heartbeat. Designed to be easy to pick up and hard to master, so grab a friend, any friend (or multiple)!

Featuring:
5 (+1 unlockable) characters to master, with unique movesets
Online multiplayer lobbies and matchmaking
Local VS mode, against players and CPU opponents
Single player arcade mode and tutorial
Full controller support, with rebindable controls
